description: Enable AI assistants to interact with the Aptos blockchain testnet by managing accounts, performing transactions, querying blockchain data, and handling tokens and NFTs. Facilitate seamless blockchain operations such as generating accounts, transferring tokens, and executing smart contract functions. Empower users to integrate blockchain capabilities into their AI workflows with ease and security.

capabilities.name: get_account_balance
capabilities.description: Get APT balance for an account

capabilities.name: account_exists
capabilities.description: Check if an account exists on the blockchain

capabilities.name: fund_account
capabilities.description: Fund an account using the testnet faucet (testnet only)

capabilities.name: get_gas_price
capabilities.description: Get the current gas price estimation

capabilities.name: transfer_apt
capabilities.description: Transfer APT tokens from one account to another
